xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.11 Hetuduka, Sekkhattika » 1.11.3 Nevasekkhanāsekkhapada » 1.11.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sekkhattika
Nevasekkhanāsekkhapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
353.
745Hetu nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo hetussa nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
354.
746Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
747Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
748Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
749(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
750Hetudukasekkhattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetvādiup1.12 Hetuduka, Parittattika >>
